[URLOTW] Ten modern layouts in one line of CSS

Aug 14, 2020 ・ 1 min read

URLOTW or URL of the week or Uniform Resource Locator of the week is a kind of post where I share a relevant URL for you :-)

This week the winner is Ten modern layouts in one line of CSS: web.dev/one-line-layouts.

This is one of the best CSS posts I have ever see. It’s a must-read if you write at least one line of CSS code per month ;-)

It’s a really rewarding reading. I hope you enjoy it!
